channel.title: computer-science on Federico Bruzzone's website
channel.description: Recent content in computer-science on Federico Bruzzone's website

item.title: Make Vim as your C/C++ IDE
item.description: In this blog post you will find a simple guide to configure Vim as your C/C++ IDE. This procedure can be very similar for VSCode and Fleet editors.

item.title: Prototype - Class Creational
item.description: Specify the kinds of objects to create using a prototypical instance, and create new objects by copying this prototype.

item.title: Factory Method pattern - Class Creational
item.description: Define an interface for creating an object, but let subclasses decide which class to instantiate. Factory Method lets a class defer instantiation to subclasses.

item.title: Builder pattern pattern - Object Creational
item.description: Separate the construction of a complex object from its representation so that the same construction process can create different representation.

item.title: Abstract Factory pattern - Object Creational
item.description: Provide an interface for creating families of related or dependent objects without specifying their concrete class.
